functions.name: registerChromeUrl
functions.description: Register folders which should be available as chrome:// urls (as defined in the legacy chrome.manifest)

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Array of manifest url definitions (content, locale, resource)

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: path of the dialog to be opened

parameters.name: windowHref
parameters.description: Url of the window, which should be listen for.

parameters.name: jsFile
parameters.description: Path to the JavaScript file, which should be loaded into the window.
